'''2.1.14401''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.14433''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.14403''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 18, 2020.

== Changes ==
* Better error handling with more informative messages.
* Migrated a few Launcher settings from <code>launcher_profiles.json</code> to <code>launcher_settings.json</code>.
* Updated Japanese and Chinese translations.
* Lower translation threshold to 50%.
* Add external icon next to external links.
* Make Loading overlay cover whole login page.
* UI tweaks and minor bug fixes.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-13293}}: adapt debian libpango dependency for package renaming.
* {{bug|MCL-13704}}: Remove potentially sensitive info from log.
